reviewText: This was very artfully produced and very well done. While graphic it has to be considering the subject matter it's still beautiful. There are many books, DVDs and other media regarding female ejaculation and this should be first on your list.

Tallulah Sulis is THE foremost expert on Female Ejaculation.

This visually stunning video is empowering, enlightening, entertaining, and erotic.

It is packed full of so much information about the g-spot and female ejaculation that you'll come away as an expert yourself.

As an erotic educator myself, whenever I have questions from clients about the g-spot or female ejaculation that I can't answer, I refer my clients to Divine Nectar, or to Tallulah herself.

Get the video and connect to a whole new aspect of your sexuality.

Yours for Greater Orgasmic Pleasure,

[]

I was blown away by this film!!!  I have not seen anything like it on the market and I am always scouting for the latest and greatest sex education films.  Between the visuals, the music, the step by step info, live and explosive demos, and several women who were solo with toys and partners---I was truly captivated by this film.  Like I said--truly unique and totally inspiring.  And guess what---it works!  My friends recommended I check it out because I heard their success stories after trying the techniques demonstrated in the film and I am yet another success story!  Seriously--if you only buy one sex-ed DVD about women's sexuality in your lifetime--get this one.
